format.description: Log file that is used by all F-Secure products to log the events that might be interesting for user. Usually its location is %ProgramFiles%\F-Secure\common\LogFile.log

regular-grammar.head-re: ^ # every log line starts with newline \d+\ {2} # line number (?<date>\d{4}\-\d{2}\-\d{2}\ {2} # year month day \d{2}\:\d{2}\:\d{2} # hour minutes seconds [\+\-]\d{2}\:\d{2})\ {2} # zone
